<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-app-bar app color="black">
      <v-toolbar-title class="white--text">VOTER</v-toolbar-title>
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <router-link to="/create-room" class="white--text">CREATE ROOM</router-link>
      <router-link to="/login" class="white--text">LOGIN</router-link>
      <router-link to="/registration" class="white--text">REGISTRATION</router-link>
    </v-app-bar>
    
    <router-view></router-view> <!-- Ovdje se prikazuju razliÄiti pogledi -->
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "App"
};
</script>


<style>
.v-app-bar {
  position: relative;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7),
    0 2px 4px -1px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
}

.v-app-bar::after {
  content: "";
  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 2px;
  background-color: white;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 4px white;
  z-index: 3;
}

.v-application--wrap {
  background: url("@/assets/Background.png") no-repeat center center fixed;
  background-size: cover;
}

.text-container {
  position: absolute;
  top: 64px;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.text-section {
  position: absolute;
}

.text-section.left {
  left: 10px;
  top: 100px;
}

.text-section.right {
  right: 50px;
  top: 130px;
}

.welcome-text,
.vote-text {
  color: white;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 3em;
  z-index: 5;
  margin: 16px;
  border: 2px solid white;
  box-shadow: 0 0 10px white;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  padding: 20px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
</style>
